meanings.sent1: Watching sad movies always emotionalizes me.
meanings.sent2: The touching music emotionalizes the audience.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's adorable antics emotionalize even the toughest person.
meanings.sent4: The sunset emotionalizes the sky with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: Her heartfelt speech emotionalizes the entire room.

meanings.sent1: The artist emotionalizes her paintings with passion.
meanings.sent2: The storyteller emotionalizes her tales with vivid descriptions.
meanings.sent3: Adding sprinkles to the ice cream emotionalizes it with extra sweetness.
meanings.sent4: The old photograph emotionalizes memories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze emotionalizes the atmosphere with tranquility.
